short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-10-03 at 14:00 EST.
description: Fiber optic cable for seismic monitoring tests

full_summary:
### Fiber-Optic Cable for Seismic Monitoring Tests

#### Solicitation Information:

* **Reference Number:** WS4151836695-Doc4213273452
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4151836695
* **Publication Date:** September 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 3, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date:** September 28, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 9, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** October 31, 2023

#### Solicitation Details:

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting bids for the supply and delivery of 8,000 meters of fiber-optic cable for seismic monitoring tests. This solicitation is issued under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to all bidders.

#### Tendering Process:

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is being issued under the solicitation number WS4151836695. The winning bidder will be selected based on the lowest price. The tender closing date has been amended to October 3, 2023, 2:00 PM EST. All bids received after this date and time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contracting Entity Information:

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

#### End-User Entity Information:

* **End-User Entity Name:** Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
* **End-User Entity Address:** 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E4, Canada

#### Contact Information:

* **Contact Name:** Gerlie Ramos (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** gerlie.ramos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** Not specified
* **Contact Fax:** Not specified
* **Contact Address:** Not specified
* **Notice URL:** Not specified

#### Additional Information:

The solicitation document and related information can be accessed through Ariba Discovery website at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17451953. A revised solicitation document is available upon request. Submission of bids is to be made by contacting the
